name: Stage Dive ft. The Fools
description:
Take the rolls of Kevin or Alfredo as they fight for the favour of the crowd! Give your best performance and gather the audiance in front of you to be the first to make the STAGE DIVE!!!

To perform you have to press the arrow or the corresponding WASD button that is shown in the circle when it reaches the center of your sepaker.
The crowd moves as you play and whoever gets the crowd to their side gets the chance to win.
But beware: you have to rock the house with a final dope challenge! (activate it with your trigger button shown on the menu)
In between your normal gameplay you get tested if you have manners: Choose between the good or the bad thing to say to the crowd!

The Giddy ups: The Hackers:

Martin Proprentner
Isopp Alexander
